name: Duel (itch) (TCC Game Generator)
description:
Welcome to Duel!

Duel is a two-player fighting game. The left player moves and jumps using the WASD keys. The right player moves and jumps using the arrow keys. Jump on your opponent's head three times to win. Press Escape to restart the game.

(You can jump onto the clouds, but be careful not to fall out of the ring!)

Created by a student of the Game Generator class at Tulsa Community College.
